patthana22.28:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.28:2.1_1: hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe
patthana22.28:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana22.28:3.1_1: hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.28:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana22.28:4.1_1: sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.28:5.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana22.28:5.1_1: hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.28:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana22.28:6.1_1: hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
patthana22.28:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.28:8.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana22.28:8.1_1: nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā
